title: MoodMix
description: A fusion of flavors and inspiration: recipes and cocktails to suit your mood.

title: TeamView-Generator
description: A command-line application that takes in information about team members, then generates an HTML webpage that displays a summary for each person.

title: WeatherDashboard
description: This weather app includes a search option, a list of cities, and a five-day forecast and current weather conditions for any city using the search option.

title: DailyPlannerApp
description: A simple calendar application that allows a user to save events for each hour of the day.

title: CodeQuiz
description: A timed, multiple-choice coding quiz that can keep track of high scores and quiz-takers' initials.

title: Console-Finances
description: Analyzing the financial records of a company
